title: Set logging level
name: setLogLevel
description: Sets the log level (info, debug...) for both the card reader and the API. Note : At the end of a transaction, the card reader logs are always automatically fetched to the API.

parameters.name: level
parameters.notes: The desired log level. Can be LogLevel.None, LogLevel.Info, LogLevel.Full, LogLevel.Debug

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This parameter specifies to the system which device you want to use for the operations. If none is supplied the system will attempt to use a default device, if any.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example.code:
//Sets the log level to info
api.SetLogLevel(LogLevel.info);

title: Set logging level
name: setLogLevel
description: Sets the log level of the hapi for both the device and the API.

parameters.name: level
parameters.notes: The desired log level. Can be LogLevel.None, LogLevel.Info, LogLevel.Full, LogLevel.Debug

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example.code:
//Sets the log level to info
api.SetLogLevel(LogLevel.info);

title: Set logging level
name: SetLogLevel
description: Sets the log level of the device.

parameters.name: level
parameters.notes: The desired log level. Can be LogLevel.None, LogLevel.Info, LogLevel.Full, LogLevel.Debug

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

example.code:
//Sets the log level to info
api.SetLogLevel(LogLevel.info);
